extensionDescription.message: Utility providing many operations on links and page URLs

customOps_description.message: Here you may view the predefined link types, and define your own. The export function uses only the types you select from the list (which is a multiple-selection list), or all custom types if you select none. The "decode parameters" option treats all substitutions as query parameters and decodes them accordingly (useful to recover form inputs).

customOps_askForContribs.message: Contributions to the built-in set, as well as additional embedded link types, are welcome. Please see $link$ for details.
customOps_askForContribs.description: This will contain a link. Just use the placeholder wherever the link needs to be, and see customOps_askForContribs_linkText to set the text of the link itself.

linkTypes_description.message: These define the types of links that are recognized, and the operations available on them.

fileReadFailed.message: The file could not be read.

invalidImport.message: The import file is not valid.

downloadsPermissionFailed.message: Failed to get permission, cancelling export.

descr-copyops.message: These will copy something into the clipboard.

descr-visitops.message: These will take you to some address.

mustHaveName.message: You must enter a name for this type.

mustHavePat.message: You must enter at least one pattern for this type.

mustHaveOps.message: You must enter at least one copy operation or at least one visit operation.

newTab.description: Appended to visit operations to form new visit operations that open a new tab instead of sending the current tab to the address.

youtube_copyLongLink.message: Copy YouTube long video link (no parameters)

youtube_copyMobileLink.message: Copy YouTube mobile video link (no parameters)
